div.p: A code from the SNOMED Clinical Terminology UK coding system to record a specimen body site.

Copyright Statement: This value set includes content from SNOMED CT, which is copyright Â© 2002+ International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO), and distributed by agreement between IHTSDO and HL7. Implementer use of SNOMED CT is not covered by this agreement.
This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

ul.li: Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where constraint = (< 442083009 Anatomical or acquired body structure OR < 49755003 Morphologically abnormal structure)

description.value: A code from the SNOMED Clinical Terminology UK coding system to record a specimen body site.

value.value: (< 442083009 Anatomical or acquired body structure OR < 49755003 Morphologically abnormal structure)
